P.title: What is the probability that a woman will be elected as the President of the United States between 2024 and 2030?
P.body:
Resolution criteria: This question will resolve as Yes if, between January 20, 2025, and January 20, 2031, a woman is inaugurated as the President of the United States. The resolution will be based on the official confirmation of the election results by the United States Electoral College and the subsequent inauguration of the elected individual as President. The individual must identify as a woman and be recognized as such by authoritative media sources. In the event of a dispute over the election results, the question will resolve based on the final decision by the relevant legal authority, such as the Supreme Court of the United States, if applicable. If a woman assumes the presidency through succession, impeachment, or any other means other than being elected and inaugurated for a new term within the specified timeframe, this will not satisfy the resolution criteria.

In the case that the inauguration date is officially changed, the resolution timeframe will be adjusted accordingly. If no woman is inaugurated as President during the specified timeframe, the question will resolve as No.

para_P.title: Between 2024 and 2030, is it likely that a female candidate will become the President of the United States?
para_P.body:
Resolution conditions: This question will resolve affirmatively if, between January 20, 2025, and January 20, 2031, a woman is sworn in as the President of the United States. The resolution will be determined by the official confirmation of election results by the United States Electoral College and the subsequent inauguration of the elected individual as President. The individual must self-identify as female and be acknowledged as such by reputable media outlets. In case of a dispute regarding election outcomes, the resolution will be based on the final ruling of the relevant legal authority, potentially including the Supreme Court of the United States. If a woman assumes the presidency through succession, impeachment, or any other method apart from being elected and inaugurated for a new term within the specified period, this will not meet the resolution criteria.

If the inauguration date is officially altered, the resolution timeframe will be modified accordingly. If no woman is inaugurated as President within the specified timeframe, the question will resolve negatively.
